post.description: Performs an In-Memory quote for price estimate. Executes import edits and rate edits.  No policyNumber is generated during this call.  This is a transient request.
post.summary: Performs an In-Memory quote for price estimate. Executes import edits and rate edits.  No policyNumber is generated during this call.  This is a transient request.

put.summary: This call persists a quote in the system.  QT_APP_POL_C = Quote.  To PUT a Quote to the system the caller will need to provide a valid Client & Address ID.  If the policyNumber/term is null a new policyNumber/term will be generated (e.g. 1500000_Q-0) and returned in response.  Policy number response will contain _Q suffix.  Quotes cannot be issued.  Quotes are used to create Quote Proposal documents.

post.description: adds a new policy quote into the system
post.summary: This call persists a quote in the system.  QT_APP_POL_C = Quote.  To PUT a Quote to the system the caller will need to provide a valid Client & Address ID.  If the policyNumber/term is null a new policyNumber/term will be generated (e.g. 1500000_Q-0) and returned in response.  Policy number response will contain _Q suffix.  Quotes cannot be issued.  Quotes are used to create Quote Proposal documents.

parameters.name: returnPolicyData
parameters.description: return full data in response indicator

get.description: adds premiums to a policy quote in the system
Returns policyQuote data for the policy number and term specified. No rating is performed.
get.summary: Returns policyquote data for the policy number and term specified. No rating is performed.

delete.summary: Deletes a policyQuote in the system.  Does not delete client core client.  Does not delete Quote Proposal documents.
delete.description: deletes a single quote based on the policyNumber supplied.

get.description: Returns quote data for the policy number and term specified. Executes rate edits and quoting.
get.summary: Returns quote data for the policy number and term specified. Executes rate edits and quoting before returning.

delete.summary: Deletes a quote in the system.  Does not delete client core client.  Does not delete Quote Proposal documents.
delete.description: deletes a single quote based on the policyNumber supplied.

post.summary: Imports a new policy in the policy System.  Does not rate the policy.  If policyNumber/term is null, then the a new policyNumber/term will be generated and returned.  If a policyNumber/term is provided it must be unique.  This could be a previous quote policyNumber w/o the _Q suffix. Executes import edits.  Requires a valid ClientID, AddressID reference to persist.  The current client core data will be used as the Primary Named Insured.  If Policy will be externally issued via PUT then a valid Bill Account Number will need to be provided.

get.description: Exports and returns a single policy in the system.
get.summary: Returns a single policy based on a single policyNumber and term.  No Edits, No Rating is performed.

delete.summary: Deletes an incomplete policy. Does not delete client core client.  Does not delete policy documents.  Not able to delete issued / active policies.
delete.description: deletes a single incomplete policy based on the policyNumber supplied.

put.description: Issue an incomplete policy in the policy system.  Execute rate + issue edits.  Requires a valid Billing Account Number was previoulsy supplied.
put.summary: Issues an incomplete policy.  Duplicates are not allowed.

post.description: executes policy rules and evalutes data to return decisions.  Underwriting, knockout rules, data validation, second pass validation edits.
post.summary: Fires the Budiness Rules based on the policy input request

post.description: surcharges or credits an existing policy in the system
post.summary: Credit policy operation to adjust various credit and surcharges on the policy.

get.summary: Gets Billing Account data.  Used to retrieve billing account information.

post.description: Wraps the exsiting XML web services.
post.summary: Posts a new billing account in the billing system. Payer ID is required to link the Billing Account to a valid Client Core record.

200.description: account creation response /w new account number
account creation response /w new account number

get.description: Returns a client using the existing XML web services.
get.summary: Returns a current client based on the clientID input parameter.

get.description: returns a search result list based on business name client search

post.summary: creates a new client in the ClientCore System.  Client can be used as the Payor in the Billing System or the Primary Named Insured in the Policy system or both.

200.description: client creation response /w new client number
